entry.title: Fruity's Jelly Ice Bar Straws - 12.6 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: DinDon Foods Corp.
Type: Candy
Price: 6.99

The Treat That Went Viral!

     Get a mouthful of juicy jelly goodness every time you suck up Fruity's Ju-C Jelly Ice Bar Straws! Each pack has a mix of wonderfully fruity flavours like Mango, Strawberry, Apple, and Grape.

     You'll know why these treats became TikTok famous when you get to experience their vibrant taste, and they get even better when you try them either frozen or chilled!

12.6oz / 360g | 1 bag

The Treat That Went Viral!

     Get your tastebuds on a flight to the Caribbean with every bite you take from Fruity's Jelly Tropical Flavor! This snack has the delicious island-themed flavours like Mango, Passion Fruit, and Lychee. They even come in easy-to-open cups making them simple to take with you in lunches, gym bags, or anywhere your day may take you!

     You'll know why these treats became TikTok famous when you get to experience their vibrant taste, and they get even better when you try them either frozen or chilled!

10.1oz / 288g | 1 bag

entry.title: Reese's Crunchy Peanut King Size Bar - 3.2oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Calling All Peanut Lovers!

     Enjoy the great taste of Reese's, but extra nutty! Every bite of Reese's Crunchy Peanut bar is jam-packed with peanut halves, smooth Reese's Peanut Butter filling, and rich milk chocolate.

     It's a tasty, tantalizing treat your tastebuds can thoroughly enjoy! If you're a fan of not just peanut butter, but full peanuts, this snack is absolutely perfect for you.

3.2oz / 87g | 1 king sized bar

entry.title: Dunkaroos Single Pack - 1.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Betty Crocker
Type: Snacks
Price: 5.99

Relive Your Childhood!

     Revel in the nostalgia of being a 90's kid with the comeback of your inevitably favourite childhood snack - Dunkaroo's! Each pack comes with those delicious mini cookies and the best part, a vanilla with sprinkles icing that had everyone hooked.

     It's the perfect time to dip into those wonderful memories, like when a pack of Dunkaroo's at lunch became a powerful bargaining chip you could trade for any snack you wanted (not that you'd want to, of course!). You may even have a child of your own that you could share the fun times and stories with while munching delectable cookies dipped in frosting!

1.5oz / 42g | 1 single pack

entry.title: Skittles Chewies Fruits UK - 45g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars Wrigley
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

Look Who Came out of Their Shell!

     Skittles Chewies Fruits lost the shell, giving you a softer, chewier texture that still has all of the delicious Skittles flavour you love so much.

     With flavours like Strawberry, Lemon, Lime, Orange, and Blackcurrant, you can truly taste the rainbow with these dreamlike treats!

  • Imported from the UK!

45g | 1 pouch

entry.title: Andy Capp's Beer Battered Onion Rings - 2oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: ConAgra Foods Inc.
Type: Snacks
Price: 2.99

Taste the Oven Baked Crunch!

     If you're looking for a yummy corn and oat snack with a satisfying crunch and bold flavour, look no further! Andy Capp's has a delicious line of snacks with 0g of trans fat that are oven-baked not fried, giving you munchies you can feel good about.

     These Beer Battered Onion Rings are a thick and tasty snack without any of the overpowering flavour of an onion seasoning. A great taste that gets even greater when you share with friends and family!

2oz / 56.7g | 1 bag

entry.title: Trolli Evil Twins - 120g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ferrara Candy Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

A Flavour Duo That Never Gets Old!

      During some late-night experiments, Dr. Gum E. Werm flipped the wrong switch and accidentally created some problematic twins. Joined at the hip, one is sweet but the other is super sour!

     They may not make for great friends, but they're fantastically yummy! The flavours of sweet and sour balance out perfectly to give you a gummy treat that might just become a new favourite. There are 3 crazy flavour combos: Angelic Orange & Mischievous Lime, Sweet Strawberry & Rowdy Blue Raspberry, and Charming Cherry & Wicked Lemon!

See the rest of our delicious Trolli gummies, there's a flavour for everyone!

4.25oz / 120g | 1 peg bag

entry.title: Minion Gummies - 50ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 5.99

A Tasty and Goofy Treat to Share

     What's more fun than a gummy treat that's shaped just like one of the loveable Minions from Despicable Me? The only thing we can think of is 50 of them! 

     Each gummy Minion is individually wrapped making this bag an easy and affordable option to hand out to trick-or-treaters on Halloween. They also make great piñata stuffers or snacks for a fantastic party!

250g | 1 bulk bag contains 50 individually wrapped pieces
